import React, {Component} from "react"; import axios from 'axios' import Parser from 'html-react-parser'; import { Checkbox } from 'pretty-checkbox'; class Main extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { headerImage: '', artwork_content: '', artworks: [], artist_image: '', artist_content: '', email_content: '', fullName: null, email: null, password: null, errors: { fullName: '', email: '', password: '', } } } componentDidMount() { axios.get('http://127.0.0.1:8000/home/').then(response => { let data = response.data.data this.setState({ headerImage: data.header_image, artwork_content: data.artwork_content, artworks: data.artworks, artist_image: data.artist_image, artist_content: data.artist_content, email_content: data.email_content, }) }).catch(error=>{ }) } render() { const {headerImage,artwork_content, artworks, artist_image, artist_content, email_content } = this.state return (

ARTWORK ABOUT CONNECT
ARTWORK ABOUT CONNECT
{Parser(artwork_content)}
{ artworks.map(artwork =>

{artwork.name}

) }
ARTWORK ABOUT CONNECT

© Photo by Michel Lunardelli

{Parser(artist_content)}
ARTWORK ABOUT CONNECT
{Parser(email_content)}
) } } export default Main
